trans-unit.source: Defines the available system gestures.
When the operating system recognizes system gestures, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当操作系统是否能够识别系统笔势<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture>

trans-unit.source: Many of the gestures map to traditional mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 许多笔势映射的传统鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Tap system gesture mimics a single left-click on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 例如，点击系统笔势会模拟鼠标单击鼠标左键。

trans-unit.source: Maps to a left drag on a mouse.
To be added.
Occurs with a short, quick stroke that translates into a specific command.
trans-unit.target: 将转换为特定命令具有短、 快速笔画会出现。

trans-unit.source: The action taken by a flick is set system-wide.
trans-unit.target: 笔画执行的操作是设置系统范围。

trans-unit.source: An application can listen for a Flick and prevent it from becoming one of the standard <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands"></xref> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled*> property to true in the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序会侦听笔势，使它成为一个标准<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands"></xref>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled*>属性为 true <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.StylusSystemGesture"> </xref>事件。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled*>

trans-unit.source: Only Windows Vista supports flicks.
trans-unit.target: 仅 Windows Vista 支持笔势。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Indicates that press and hold has occurred.
To be added.
Not implemented.
To be added.
Maps to a mouse hover.
This can be used to show ToolTip rollover effects, or other mouse hover behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用于显示工具提示滚动更新效果或其他鼠标悬停时的行为。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Maps to a mouse leaving a hover.
This can be used to end ToolTip rollover effects or other mouse hover behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用于结束工具提示的滚动更新效果或其他鼠标悬停时的行为。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
No system gesture.
To be added.
Maps to a right drag on a mouse.
This can be used to drag an object or selection to a different area and is followed by the appearance of the shortcut menu which provides options for moving the object.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用来将对象或所选内容拖到不同区域，并且后跟的快捷菜单，其中提供了用于移动对象选项的外观。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Maps to a right-click on a mouse.
This can be used to show a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用于显示快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Maps to a left-click on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 映射到的鼠标左键单击。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to choose a command from the menu or toolbar, take action if a command is chosen, set an insertion point, or show selection feedback.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用于选择从菜单或工具栏、 采取的措施的命令，是否已选择的命令，设置插入点，或显示选择的反馈。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Maps to a double-click of a mouse.
To be added.
